[[Sakon and Ukon]] separate and use a combined [[Summoning Technique]] to summon the Rashōmon flat on the ground. The demonic gate then opens and swallows the opponent into another dimension. 
{{DEFAULTSORT:Summoning: Rashomon Hell}}
